title: Mastery Points Bug?
body:
Hi everyone, I've just played two normal blind pick games on graves and not received any mastery points for either of them, it said I was "Eligible for Mastery Points" in the lobby and yet I got none, even getting an S in one of my  games. Does anyone know what I should do? I'm about to send in a ticket. 
Thanks,
Max

replies.body: Yes I do, and have been receiving mastery points as usual for the past two days.

~~I'd recommend submitting a ticket then, it m might have been a small scale or short lived issue on Riot's end, not sure.~~

~~https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new~~

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/EKTIurXH-0-mastery-points-from-games-on-82?comment=0002

Looks like it's been fixed.
i have currently experienced the same bug, i think its best to send a ticket.
